Class CssGssContext

java.lang.Object
  org.timepedia.chronoscope.client.gss.GssContext
      org.timepedia.chronoscope.client.browser.CssGssContext

public class CssGssContext
extends org.timepedia.chronoscope.client.gss.GssContext

Implements a GssContext by injecting hidden DOM elements for each GssElement,pseudoElement pair that is queried.
